Text:
"THIS" is readily available, not "THE" is...

I really need to start writing up the descriptions in Word or something. lol

Never noticed the mis-spelling. DID notice the effort put in for wayward (lazy) fans of this work.

A thousand thanks for your work.
Glad you guys dig it. I've had it up on SLSK from time to time for years, but it's been mostly ignored. Should have known there'd be some adventurous Alan Moore readers at TPB.
